lego: worrying about how you're going to
practice_phrases: I'm worrying about how you're going to move.
我担心你将如何搬家。
She's worrying about how you're going to find it.
她担心你将如何找。
I'm worrying about how you're going to play together.
我担心你将如何一起玩。
He's worrying about how you're going to turn left.
他担心你将如何向左转。
I hate worrying about how you're going to move to the city.
我讨厌担心你将如何搬到城市。
We're worrying about how you're going to run across the grass.
我们担心你将如何跑过草地。
I'm worrying about how you're going to live around here before you move.
我担心你将如何在搬家之前住在这附近。
She's worrying about how you're going to play together without arguing years ago.
她担心多年前你将如何一起玩不吵架。
If only I could trust you, I wouldn't be worrying about how you're going to move.
要是我能相信你就好了，我不会担心你将如何搬家。
I hate making trouble, but I'm worrying about how you're going to turn right instead of left.
我讨厌制造麻烦，但我担心你将如何向右转而不是向左转。
I know how to pay.
我知道如何付钱。
Do you know how to pay?
你知道如何付钱吗？
She's learning how to pay at the entrance.
她在入口学习如何付钱。
I'm trying to learn how to pay now.
我现在试着学习如何付钱。
I used to know how to pay years ago.
多年前我以前知道如何付钱。
He moved to the city before learning how to pay.
他在学习如何付钱之前搬到了城市。
If only I could teach you how to pay without making trouble.
要是我能教你如何付钱不制造麻烦就好了。
I hate worrying about how to pay when I'm standing alone inside.
我讨厌一个人站在里面时担心如何付钱。
I'm worrying about how you're going to learn how to pay.
我担心你将如何学习如何付钱。
She almost got lost before learning how to pay at that one entrance over there.
她在那边入口学习如何付钱之前差点迷路。
I want to pay.
我想付钱。
She's going to pay now.
她现在要付钱。
I used to pay at the entrance.
我以前在入口付钱。
He doesn't want to pay inside.
他不想在里面付钱。
I'm trying to pay before we move.
我试着在我们搬家之前付钱。
She hates worrying about how to pay.
她讨厌担心如何付钱。
I used to pay years ago before we moved to the city.
多年前我们搬到城市之前我以前付钱。
If only I could trust you to pay without making trouble between the two of us.
要是我能相信你付钱不在我们两个中间制造麻烦就好了。
I'm worrying about how you're going to pay at that entrance over there.
我担心你将如何在那边入口付钱。
She almost got lost because she was trying to find how to pay instead of turning right.
她差点迷路因为她试着找如何付钱而不是向右转。
That's meaningless.
那个没有意义。
This is no point.
这个没有意义。
Making trouble is meaningless now.
现在制造麻烦没有意义。
Arguing about that one is no point.
争吵那个没有意义。
I think worrying about it is meaningless.
我认为担心它没有意义。
Running across the grass without paying is no point.
不付钱跑过草地没有意义。
I hate to say this, but turning left instead of right was meaningless years ago.
我讨厌说这个，但多年前向左转而不是向右转没有意义。
If only I could trust you to understand that making trouble between us is no point.
要是我能相信你理解在我们中间制造麻烦没有意义就好了。
Standing alone inside that entrance without knowing how to pay is completely meaningless.
一个人站在那个入口里面不知道如何付钱完全没有意义。
There's no point worrying about how you're going to pay.
担心你将如何付钱没有意义。
